alert.note: Alert for Graham; Macon; Northern Jackson; Southern Jackson; Swain (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Greenville-Spartanburg (Western North Carolina and Northwest South Carolina)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 15 at 3:57AM EDT by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Macon, Jackson, southeastern Swain and eastern Graham Counties through 430 AM EDT... At 355 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 5 miles west of Bryson City to 4 miles south of Hayesville. Movement was east at 55 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Franklin, Sylva, Bryson City, Cherokee, Cullowhee, Highlands, Balsam, Webster, Dillsboro and Nantahala Lake. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Graham; Macon; Northern Jackson; Southern Jackson; Swain
